about_the_game:
Unlock state after state!

Build a successful transportation company serving all the states of America. Each state has is unique - they differ in area and city population.

Transport VIPs!

From time to time, various influential people will want to use your company's services - businessmen, musical bands and actors. You will have to deliver them to each city from their list in turn. Serve them on time and get a generous reward!

Launch marketing campaigns!

Feeling confident and have already taken control of passenger traffic? Well, then try to increase it and earn more! You can launch marketing campaigns in certain states. They will lead to a significant increase in passenger traffic in the selected territory for a certain time.

New scenarios!

Try your hand at non-standard situations. Can you build a successful transportation company serving passengers in the most remote and sparsely populated corners of the state of Alaska? Will you be able to organize profitable tourist flights to Hawaii? How about you build a profitable company on the East Coast in a limited time?

New monthly modes!

Try to compete with other players for a place in the leaderboard in new game modes. In one of them, all passengers from everywhere will fly to one city (and this city will change every ten minutes), and in another, it's up to you to choose which of all available cities to unlock next.

Scenario Editor, Free Mode, Ladder - everything is in place!

The American Dream add-on has its own version of the Scenario Editor, as well as the ability to play scenarios created for this add-on by other players. Other game modes familiar from the main game, but transformed for the USA, are also present.
